name: dynamic/silverstripe-locator
description: SilverStripe Locator Module. Show locations on a map. Search by geoposition.

suggest.unclecheese/betterbuttons: Adds new form actions and buttons to GridField detail form for usability enhancements.
suggest.unclecheese/bootstrap-forms: Allows the creation of forms compatible with the Twitter Bootstrap CSS framework in SilverStripe.
